page.title: 18EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content:
{Police You have to be 19 years old to start training. It takes two years to years to train a police man or woman. {The ranks for police are,}in order, beginning with the lowest rank, Police Constable, Sergeant, Inspector, Superintendant, Chief Superintendant, Assistant Chief Constable, Deputy Chief Constable and Chief Constable.
They drive{FORD ESCORT}cars and also {FORD GRANADAS.}They have {V.H.F} {(VERY HIGH FREQUENCY)} and{U.H.F {(ULTRA HIGH FREQUENCY)}radios, which they use to contact each other, even when travelling in cars.
The police get from 90 to 100 calls every month and most of them are road accidents.
